name: Elephant House Pork Sausages
description:
The Superior Golden Crispy Crumbs Deliver the ultimate snacking experience where with each bite you are guaranteed the delicious Krest experience.

Ready-to–fry Formed Meat range is ideal for both snacks and meal times. Beautifully battered and crumbed with Superior Crispy Crumbs, they turn into hot, crisp, appetizing feasts in minutes.

 *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
